## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `pnpm run lint` and fixed all issues
- [ ] I have run `pnpm run build` successfully

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (README, SECURITY, PRIVACY, etc.)
- [ ] I have updated code comments where necessary
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions/components

### Commits
- [ ] My commits follow the Conventional Commits specification
- [ ] My commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] I have squashed unnecessary commits

### Values Alignment
- [ ] This PR respects user privacy (no tracking, minimal data collection)
- [ ] This PR maintains/improves security
- [ ] This PR supports decentralization and censorship resistance
- [ ] This PR follows open source best practices
- [ ] This PR does not introduce proprietary dependencies without justification

### Legal
- [ ] I have read and agree to the [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- [ ] I agree to license my contributions under GNU GPL v3.0
- [ ] I have the right to submit this code
